Package be.ac.umons.jsonschematools

Contains tools to manipulate and abstract a JSON Schema, a generator, and a validator.
Author:
GaÃ«tan Staquet
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractConstants
    Constants used for our abstractions for strings, integers, numbers, and enum values.
    ComparableJSONArray
    A JSONArray that implements the Comparable interface.
    ComparableJSONObject
    A JSONObject that implements the interface.
    DefaultGenerator
    Constructs a Generator with the default handlers.
    DefaultValidator
    Constructs a Validator with default handlers.
    Generator
    A generator for JSON documents, given a JSON schema.
    JSONSchema
    A JSON schema describes constraints JSON documents must satisfy.
    JSONSchemaStore
    Stores the schemas used so far.
    Validator
    Decides whether a JSON document satisfies a JSON schema.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Type
    The different types a value can take.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    GeneratorException
    The exception thrown if the generator can not generate a value.
    JSONSchemaException
    Exception thrown by a JSON Schema.
